item.title: From ‘low-class’ and ‘talentless’ to ‘narcissist and pathological liar’: a functional-pragmatic approach to Meghan Markle’s negative evaluation on X

item.title: Can cultural distance be a factor in bilingual processing? Report from primed translation recognition task of Rongmei–Meitei bilinguals
item.description: Article by Opangienla Kechu, Bidisha Som, Luis Benites, Rocío Maehara DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/psicl-2023-0015
